name: Psync
0:
”Alexa, Show the front door camera”
”Alexa, turn on the door camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Psync Skill and Alexa, you can control both your Psync cameras. 

You can control your camera from any Alexa enabled device by saying "Alexa, turn on the kitchen camera". 

Before you get started, please make sure your Psync device is online and updated to the latest firmware. Then enable the Psync Skill in Alexa app or ask Alexa to enable the skill by saying "Alexa, enable the Psync Skill" and you will be directed to link your Psync account with your Alexa account. 

You can view live feed and listen to the audio from your Psync devices. Alexa also works with the shared users so anyone with access to the camera can view the activity. But please note that you will not be able to view playback, or speak to people through your Alexa devices. 

Some example commands are:

"Alexa, show my front door."
"Alexa, show my kitchen."
"Alexa, go home."
"Alexa, stop."
